articles.author: Joshua Franklin, George Steer
articles.title: Kolanovic to leave JPMorgan after series of mistimed stock market calls - Financial Times
articles.description: Top analyst leaves US bank after bearish forecasts on S&P 500
articles.content:
Marko Kolanovic will leave his role as JPMorgans chief global markets strategist, ending a 19-year stint that culminated in a series of mistimed calls on the US stock market.
Kolanovic, also the ban… [+2841 chars]

articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: Meta ordered to stop training its AI on Brazilian personal data - The Verge
articles.description: Brazil’s data protection authority has banned Meta from training its AI models on images and other personal data from Brazilian Facebook and Instagram accounts.
articles.content:
Meta ordered to stop training its AI on Brazilian personal data
Meta ordered to stop training its AI on Brazilian personal data
